info.author: NiteoWeb Ltd.
info.description:
====================
Track multiple Tracs
====================

:Project title: multitrac
:Project id: multitrac
:Author: NiteoWeb Ltd.
:Source: https://github.com/niteoweb/multitrac
:Docs: http://readthedocs.org/docs/multitrac
:Framework: Pyramid

Quick Start
===========

Start hacking away on this project by running::

  $ git clone git@github.com:niteoweb/multitrac.git
  $ cd multitrac
  $ virtualenv -p python2.6 --no-site-packages ./
  $ bin/python bootstrap.py
  $ bin/buildout
  $ bin/paster serve development.ini

=========
Changelog
=========

0.1.2 (2010-02-26)
==================

- Added sane package description.
  [zupo]

0.1.1 (2010-02-26)
==================

- Re-releasing 1.0.
  [zupo]


0.1 (2010-02-26)
================

- Initial release.
  [brodul, zupo]

=======

info.name: multitrac
info.summary: A pyramid application to manage multiple Trac installations
info.html_description:
Track multiple Tracs

Project title:multitrac
Project id:multitrac
Author:NiteoWeb Ltd.
Source:https://github.com/niteoweb/multitrac
Docs:http://readthedocs.org/docs/multitrac
Framework:Pyramid

Quick Start

Start hacking away on this project by running:

$ git clone git@github.com:niteoweb/multitrac.git
$ cd multitrac
$ virtualenv -p python2.6 --no-site-packages ./
$ bin/python bootstrap.py
$ bin/buildout
$ bin/paster serve development.ini
